TopicTitle: We say that there's no "late". I had to make this.

Articles.Content: Hallo, maybe you saw me, maybe not, but at the time I posted it I had 164 posts. Maybe really late?

3 hours ago, Gapone said:

Hallo, maybe you saw me, maybe not, but at the time I posted it I had 164 posts. Maybe really late?

Hi Gapone and welcome to the forum

This reminds me that I haven't introduced myself here as well....maybe I should do it on my first anniversary
Never too late...Craft, forgot to introduce myself.

I also didn't introduce myself.

I'm Roboslacker, and I have around 400 hours in KSP on steam. I play with light mods, and have a mission thread. I've also made some Gmod comics.

Fine, i'll do that here.

My name is Galih, i'm Indonesian, currently second year High school, i'm 17 years old now, first know KSP from a Middle school classmate, he reached Duna one year after that, got my very first KSP since last year Middle school final semester, now has 1.5 years experience (i got a vacuum), some of you saw me quite oftenly here.
